ui-tokens.diff:
style(ui): use theme variables for button colors

- Updated Button component to use CSS variables instead of hardcoded classes
- Added hover states using theme tokens
- Enabled color transitions
theme-vars.diff:
style(theme): update color variables

- Updated primary color definitions
- Added new text and surface color variables
- Refined hover states for primary color
search-feature.diff:
feat(search): implement search component

- Created new Search component
- Implemented query state management
- Added input field for documentation search
docs-update.diff:
docs(intro): update installation instructions

- Updated global install command
- Added Quick Start section with init command
fix-bug.diff:
fix(parser): handle empty input gracefully

- Fixed crash when input is undefined or empty
- Added null return for invalid input
refactor-core.diff:
refactor(utils): modernize helpers module

- Replaced custom logging with logger module
- Switched to date-fns for date formatting
- Simplified module exports
breaking-change.diff:
refactor(api)!: change connect method signature

- Changed connect method to accept an object parameter
- Added retries to configuration

BREAKING CHANGE: connect method now requires an object with url, timeout, and retries instead of positional arguments
test-update.diff:
test(parser): add coverage for empty input

- Added test case for empty input handling
- Verified null return behavior
release-prep.diff:
chore(release): bump version to 1.1.0

- Updated package version
ci-config.diff:
ci(workflow): enable coverage reporting

- Switched to npm ci for reliable builds
- Added coverage reporting to test step
